page.title: 20THE WHARF THEATRE,DEVIZES.
page.content: The ground floor of the Wharf Theatre is a foyer with a coffee bar and a licensed bar.The first floor is the auditorium containing only ninety-six seats.The stage area is small with two backstage entrances. At the back of the auditorium is the lighting box which controls all the lights.Backstage is a props room and an area used by musicians and actors waiting to go on stage.Upstairs is the dressing and make-up room.Some costumes are stored here but they are mostly stored in the Costume Department to be found in the other warehouse on the Wharf. {DOMESDAY PROJECT CREDITS. {Class 4T}from{Southbroom Junior School Devizes. {White and Yellow Unit}from{Wansdyke {C.P. School,}Devizes.
